decks.notes: The deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures and using burn spells to control the board and deal damage to the opponent quickly. It also incorporates a sacrifice theme with cards like Goblin Bombardment and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah to gain additional value from sacrificing creatures. The deck aims to apply early pressure and close out the game before the opponent can stabilize. Additionally, there are some cards that enable card selection and graveyard interaction to maintain resources and stay ahead in the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing the combo of Underworld Breach, Grinding Station, and Emry, Lurker of the Loch to continuously loop through cards and generate advantage, ultimately leading to a win condition. The deck includes various artifacts and cantrips to support the combo, with cards like Mishra's Bauble and Mox Opal helping to generate mana and card advantage. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides additional card draw and selection, while Malevolent Rumble and Unholy Heat act as removal and disruption against opponents. The key strategy revolves around setting up the combo pieces and overwhelming the opponent with card advantage and board presence.

The main concept of this deck is to use Underworld Breach in combination with various artifacts and creatures to create a powerful combo that generates immense value and advantage. By utilizing cards like Grinding Station and Chromatic Sphere, the deck can quickly cycle through its deck and generate a ton of mana to play powerful spells like Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Command. The deck also incorporates creatures like Skittering Precursor and Haywire Mite to apply pressure on the opponent while setting up the combo. Ultimately, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and consistent combo engine.

The key concept of the deck is to utilize the combination of Glaring Fleshraker, Basking Broodscale, and Blade of the Bloodchief to create a powerful creature that can quickly overwhelm opponents. The deck also aims to control the board using removal spells like Kozilek's Command and Dismember, while utilizing Ancient Stirrings to search for key combo pieces. The inclusion of cards like Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble allows for fast mana acceleration and card draw, helping to set up the combo quickly and efficiently.

The deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana quickly through rituals and mana-producing spells, then using Ral, Monsoon Mage and other spells to deal damage to the opponent in a single turn. The key strategy is to chain together spells to create a storm of damage, utilizing cards like Pyretic Ritual and Manamorphose to generate extra mana and draw cards. The deck aims to win through a explosive combo turn where multiple spells are cast in succession, overwhelming the opponent with damage before they can respond.

The deck focuses on assembling powerful equipment such as Colossus Hammer and Kaldra Compleat quickly, utilizing cards like Puresteel Paladin and Stoneforge Mystic to cheat them onto the battlefield. Using cards like Urza's Saga and Sigarda's Aid, the deck aims to create explosive turns where it can equip these powerful artifacts for massive damage in a single swing. The deck also features some control elements to protect its key pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to set up an overwhelming board presence and win the game in a few swift and decisive blows.

This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with cards like Mishra's Bauble, Faithless Looting, and Burning Inquiry to trigger the graveyard-based mechanics of the creatures like Hollow One, Nethergoyf, and Detective's Phoenix. By utilizing cheap and efficient spells like Lightning Bolt and Tarfire to control the board and dealing direct damage to the opponent, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Orcish Bowmasters, closing out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

Utilizing a mix of counterspells, removal, and graveyard manipulation, this Dimir Control deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also controlling the board. The deck includes cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to remove threats, alongside Counterspell and Force of Negation to prevent key spells from resolving. Graveyard Trespasser and Murktide Regent provide threats that can close out the game quickly, while cards like Thought Scour and Unearth enable graveyard synergies. The deck also includes lands that provide a mix of color fixing and graveyard recursion options.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with cards like Golgari Thug, Stinkweed Imp, and Cathartic Reunion to trigger the Dredge mechanic, bringing back creatures like Narcomoeba and Prized Amalgam. Otherworldly Gaze and Tome Scour help to dig deeper into the deck while Steam Vents and Polluted Delta provide mana fixing. The key strategy is to chain together multiple dredge triggers to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of creatures and burn spells like Conflagrate to finish them off. The combo potential is high with cards like Silversmote Ghoul and Ox of Agonas providing additional value.

The key strategy of this deck revolves around quickly assembling the Amulet Titan combo by utilizing cards like Amulet of Vigor, Primeval Titan, and various land searching abilities. By ramping up mana production and utilizing lands that provide additional benefits when they enter the battlefield, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures and land triggers. The deck also includes cards like Scapeshift and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle to provide alternate win conditions and ways to deal massive amounts of damage in a single turn.

The deck focuses on quickly disrupting the opponent's hand with cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, while also using cards like Burning Inquiry and Waste Not to generate advantage. The creatures in the deck, such as Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Dragon's Rage Channeler, are aggressive in nature and can quickly apply pressure to the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Fatal Push and Lightning Bolt for removal, and Underworld Breach for graveyard recursion. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of disruption, aggression, and card advantage.
